name: Rose Duel
description:
So Rose Duel is a short sequence of turn-based fights that i threw together 'cause i was bored. Basically the idea is you have to analyse what your opponent is trying to do, and outplay them. In theory, at least, not sure how good a job i did with that, but here we are. Also it's a tad unpolished and doesn't have any music but i'm frankly tired of working on it so this is the version you get.

Have fun! Or don't, i guess. Don't let me tell you what to do.
